channel.title: 508 problem help. please look
channel.description:
Ok, I have Scaperune 10.8 source (508) and in the "notes" it says from the creator i guess canownueasy i think, it says
Notes:
If you are using my base, get the following to work.
1. Basic cooking base 2. Basic fishing base 3. PK Point Box Exhchange 4. Weapon Requirements 5. Fix Hashing
(They are all in there, I just didn't enable them.)
How do you enable them? I want weapon requirements the most :P
